description:
Cocoa stains her work uniform, but the household washing machine is broken, so she decides to hand-wash her uniform along with Chino`s and Rize`s. The activity leads Chino to wonder if it`s finally time to change the Rabbit House employee uniforms. Later, all the girls get together at Syaro`s house for a curry party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amaenbou na Ano Ko wa Shabondama no You ni Hakanaku Kieru
That Babyish Little Child Vanishes Like a Soap Bubble
甘えん坊なあの子はシャボン玉のように儚く消える
